3: Is everyone ready? Hold your neighbors tight and keep the children close. We're moving now to the Southern Diocese.
If we do not live within God's reach, then I will bring us all to where God can see us.
Even if our prayers are unheard, and salvation never comes, I do not intend to merely sit and wait—
Everyone will be saved... I'll protect you all, until the end.
So, let us move.
(Please wait for me, Father Snow, I will bring them all to the eastern diocese, then I'll be returning to the church...)
On the hazy snowy horizon, the outline of the travelers could be seen getting closer and closer, only leaving a trail of footsteps behind them.
Stay together, everyone! Let me know if anyone is feeling unwell.
Careful!
Sister! Is that... the army?
It is! It's the army! We're saved! Thank God we're saved!
What's that in the back?! A Corrupted?! How could this be?!
Civilians sighted! There are Corrupted behind! Stay in formation! Protect the civilians!
Quick, everyone! Run toward the army!
... Please lend me a weapon.
... This... nun?
You're... A nun? I suppose you've never held a gun before, then... You'll be safer if you just stay in the back...
... Please lend me a weapon.
Alright! Here! A gun!
God, I ask for your forgiveness for the sins I am about to commit...
Be prepared to atone for your sins, for I shall be your judgment!
